All Classes

Class
Description
CheckButton
 
Field
The class that subsequently forms the playing field
Frame
Translates everything into a graphical presentation for the players
FramePanel
Creates a panel on which everything is on when you start one of the games
GameField
This is where most of the game is processed Includes the playing field and working with the players
GamePanel
Displays the game itself
GamePanel
Class that transfers graphical representation Most of the logic for the quoridor game is handled here
GamePhase
enum determining the phase of the game
GamePlaying
Determines which game is currently being played
HiddenMoveButton
A class that mediates the movement of players around the playing field
Main
 
Mastermind
Class where game Mastermind is being processed
MoveButton
Class that displays hidden buttons for movement
Pin
Class for storing colour values
PlaceWallButton
Class containing a button for displaying walls on the playing field
Player
Represents the player behind the computer in the game
Quoridor
There's a whole game of quoridor going on here
ResetButton
Shuts down the game and returns the player to the game lobby
ResetMastermind
Class that creates the ability to reset the Mastermind game
ResetQuoridorButton
Class that creates the ability to reset the Tic Tac Toe game
ResetTicTacToeButton
Class that creates the ability to reset the Tic Tac Toe game
Row
Class to store pins in a group
SidePanel
Creates a side panel on which the moin control buttons are located
TextPanel
Creates a text panel that provides players with information about the games
TicTacToe
the whole game of Tic Tac Toe takes place in it
Wall
Creates obstacles between Fields and graphical output for the players
WallDirection
Divides walls into horizontal and vertical
